featured.text: At least one group, Intervac, has been facilitating such an arrangement since 1953.
A contrast between Intervac and HomeExchange. bills 50.

definition.zh_def: 互換住宿的計劃或系統，讓人們在不同地點的家中互相居住。
definition.en_def: A system or plan for exchanging accommodations, allowing people to stay in each other's homes in different locations.
definition.example: We decided to join an intervac program to experience living in another country.
